sentences.sContent: He’s just being nice. I don’t think he has any ulterior motives.
sentences.sCn: 他就是好心，我不认为他别有用心。

synos.tran: 将来的，较远的；在那边的；隐秘不明的

remMethod.val: ult (高， 远) + erior → 较远的

words.tran: 进一步地；未表明地；隐蔽地

trans.tranCn: 隐秘的， 别有用心的
trans.tranOther: a reason for doing something that you deliberately hide in order to get an advantage for yourself
